trans-unit.source: Implements a selectable item inside a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer et valgbar element i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By default, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> of a ComboBoxItem is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Som standard <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>for en ComboBoxItem er satt til <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default horizontal position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Standard vannrette posisjonen for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>er <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> property of a ComboBoxItem through a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, the panel's default is applied and the item will be centered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>for ComboBoxItem via en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>panelets standard brukes og elementet midtstilles.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A ComboBoxItem is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: En ComboBoxItem er en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, noe som betyr at det kan inneholde ett enkelt objekt av en annen type (for eksempel en streng, et bilde eller en panelet).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ComboBoxItem Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ComboBoxItem controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tilpasse den ComboBoxItem kontrollen til gjelder samme egenskapsinnstillingene flere ComboBoxItem kontroller, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>Gi kontrollen unikt utseende.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ComboBoxItem, see [ComboBox Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se delene og statusene som er spesifikke for ComboBoxItem, kan du se [ComboBox stiler og maler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighet egenskapene for denne kontrollen, kan angis ved kontrollens standardstilen.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en egenskap er satt av en standardstilen, kan endre egenskapen standardverdi når kontrollen vises i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardstilen er avhengig av hvilken stasjonær tema brukes når programmet kjører.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [standard WPF oppsett](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ComboBoxItem control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Angi en visual egenskap trenger bare en effekt hvis egenskapen er begge finnes i ComboBoxItem kontrollens standardmalen og angis ved hjelp av en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner en liste over visual egenskaper i delen "Endring i Visual strukturen av et kontroll" [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem"></xref> class
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem"> </xref> klassen

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the item is highlighted.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om elementet er merket.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used by styles that need a highlight to indicate selection.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan brukes av stiler som krever en utheving til å angi utvalget.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsHighlighted has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: Starter med .NET Framework, versjon 3.0 har Service Pack 1, IsHighlighted en beskyttet setter.

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke denne funksjonen, må programmet mål .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier Field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem"></xref> is highlighted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem"> </xref> er merkede; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem.IsHighlighted*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem.IsHighlighted*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem.IsHighlighted*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: Old content.
trans-unit.target: Gammelt innhold.

trans-unit.source: New content.
trans-unit.target: Nytt innhold.

trans-unit.source: Announces that the keyboard is focused on this element.
trans-unit.target: Annonserer at tastaturet fokuserer på dette elementet.

trans-unit.source: Keyboard input event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Tastatur inndata hendelsen argumenter.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Svarer på en <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Svarer på den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Svarer på den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"> </xref>.
